body_html:
I can leave summary here;
In CMakeList.txt

  1. a wrong version number for cuda_config.h for unix/linux
  2. no "add_definitions" are for unix/linux (currently, many -D flags are for Windows)
  3. cuda header path (include_directories) is needed
  4. cudnn so libs is needed
    let me update this soon again.
    Thanks

body:
I can leave summary here; 
In CMakeList.txt 
1. a wrong version number for cuda_config.h for unix/linux
2. no "add_definitions" are for unix/linux (currently, many -D flags are for Windows)
3.  cuda header path (include_directories) is needed 
4.  cudnn so libs is needed 
let me update this soon again. 
Thanks
